metadata.title: CVE-2018-20804 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of serviceby issuing specially crafted applyOps invocations. This issue affectsMongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.10 and MongoDB Server v3.6versions prior to 3.6.13.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
